text: The Samsung Galaxy S6, Galaxy S6 or just GS6 is an Android-based smartphone developed, manufactured, released and marketed by Samsung Electronics. It is the successor to the Samsung Galaxy S5 and the predecessor to the Samsung Galaxy S7. It was unveiled on March 1, 2015 with the Samsung Galaxy S6 Edge and released on April 5, 2015. On August 21, 2015, the Samsung Galaxy S6 Edge+ was released. == Reception == The Samsung Galaxy S6 gained good reviews. It was critiziced for its battery, which is not able to keep the phone on as long as it could with the Samsung Galaxy S5. The battery can also no longer be replaced with a new battery, which means that as soon as the battery expires, the device will not function properly. === Known issues === The capacitive touch keys of the S6 sometimes do not work. It is also possible that they do not light up or the brightness of the light varies. == Sales == After one month, 10 million Samsung Galaxy S6 units were shipped, 6 million of them were sold. == References == == Other websites == * Official website Category:Samsung Galaxy Category:Mobile phones with 4K video recording Category:Mobile phones introduced in 2015
title: Samsung Galaxy S6
